data.text: Wuowi mariek winjo puonj wuon mare,
Ngʼat makare yudo pok maber kaluwore gi gik mowacho,
Ngʼatno morito dhoge orito ngimane,
Jasamuoyo dwaro gimoro gi chunye duto to ok oyud gimoro,
Ngʼat makare mon kod gima ok adiera,
Tim makare rito ngʼat mobidhore,
Ngʼat moro wuondore ni en ja-mwandu,
Mwandu ngʼato sa moro nyalo reso ngimane,
Ler mar ngʼat makare rieny maler,
Sunga nywolo mana dhawo,
Pesa moyud e yo ma ok kare lal nono,
Gima igeno mobudho miyo chuny bedo matuo,
Ngʼat ma jaro puonj biro yudo pokne,
Puonj mar ngʼat mariek en soko mar ngima
Bedo gi winjo kelo luor,
Ngʼato ka ngʼato mariek timo gik moko kuom ngʼeyo,
Jaote marach donjo e chandruok,
Ngʼat modagi siem nwangʼo dhier kod wichkuot,
Geno mochopi en gima mit ne chuny,
Ngʼat mawuotho gi ngʼama riek bedo mariek,
Chandruok luwo jaricho,
Ngʼat maber weyo mwandu ne nyithind nyithinde,
Puoth ngʼat ma jachan sa moro nyalo nyago chiemo mangʼeny,
Ngʼat ma ok ti kod kede kuom chwado wuode, omon kod wuode,
Joma kare chiemo moromo kaka chunygi dwaro,
